mapper.select: select my_name, nick_name, user_name, sub_classify, crt_time from (select tu.name as my_name, tu.nick_name, tus.sno, tus.crt_time, tus.sub_classify from music.t_user tu join music.t_user_subscript tus on tu.uno = tus.sno where tu.uno=#{uno}) a left join (select uno, name as user_name from t_user tu) b on a.sno = b.uno;

select my_name, nick_name, scriptor, sub_classify, crt_time from (select tu.name as my_name, tu.nick_name, tus.uno, tus.crt_time, tus.sub_classify from music.t_user tu join music.t_user_subscript tus on tu.uno = tus.sno where tus.sno=#{uno}) a left join (select uno, name as scriptor from t_user tu) b on a.uno = b.uno
